item.title: X Layer On-Chain Meme Coin XDOG Surges by 27.6% in the Last 24 Hours, with a Current Market Cap of $9.3 Million
item.description: On August 29th, according to GMGN data, the on-chain meme coins on X Layer witnessed an increase. They include:XDOG, which saw a 27.6% price increase in the last 24 hours and currently holds a market value of $9.3 million;DOGSHIT, with an 8.4% price increase in the last 24 hours and currently having a market value of $3.4 million.BlockBeats reminds users that meme coins often lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: Gate Exchange's 7-day Net Fund Inflow Surpasses $66.29 Million, Ranking Third Globally
item.description: On August 29th, based on the data from DefiLlama, Gate's 7-day net inflow of funds reached $66.29 million, ranking third globally.

item.title: Binance Hemi Booster Phase 1 Event Rewards are now available for claiming
item.description: On August 29th, Binance made an announcement that the rewards for the first phase of the Hemi Booster event have become available for claiming.

item.title: Affected by Bithumb Listing, CAMP Experiences a Short-Term Surge of Over 10% Reaching $0.105
item.description: On August 29th, according to HTX market data, due to the upcoming CAMP KRW trading pair on Bithumb, CAMP witnessed a short-term surge of more than 10%, reaching $0.105, and is currently trading at $0.102.

item.title: Bithumb will list the CAMP/KRW trading pair
item.description: August 29th. As per an official announcement, Bithumb is set to list the CAMP/KRW trading pair.

item.title: Meme Coin COPE Market Cap Surges to Over $17 Million, with a 489% Price Increase in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 29th, according to GMGN data, the on-chain Meme coin COPE's market capitalization briefly exceeded $17 million, reaching a historical high, with a 24-hour gain of 489%. It currently has a market capitalization of $14 million and a 24-hour trading volume of $32.3 million.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins often lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: Lightning Labs CEO Applies to Establish Special Purpose Acquisition Company
item.description: On August 29th, Ryan Gentry, the CEO of Lightning Network developer Lightning Labs, submitted an S-1 filing to set up a special purpose acquisition company named Bitcoin Infrastructure Acquisition Corp, which has a valuation of $200 million. The company intends to acquire other digital financial infrastructure firms. The board members come from DeFi Dev Corp and Nakamoto (Kindly).

item.title: Sequoia Capital: AI Wave Holds $100 Trillion Opportunity, Transformative Power to Rival Industrial Revolution
item.description: On August 29th, Sequoia Capital has characterized the current wave of artificial intelligence as a profound "Cognitive Revolution." It believes that its transformative power will be on a par with or even exceed that of the Industrial Revolution and holds a massive business opportunity of $10 trillion. Recently, Sequoia Capital partner Konstantine Buhler delivered a speech titled "The AI Revolution: A $10 Trillion Wave, Grandier Than the Industrial Revolution." In the speech, it is clearly stated that the next battlefield for AI is the vast service industry market. Just like how SaaS software not only ate into the market share of traditional software but also significantly expanded the boundaries of the entire market, AI will also undergo disruptive reshaping and expansion in the service industry. Similarly, AI will radically reshape and expand industries such as law, accounting, and healthcare, which were traditionally dominated by large partnership firms. This will give rise to AI-dri

item.title: A whale deposited 3 million USDC into HyperLiquid, shorted XPL with 1x leverage.
item.description: On August 29th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale deposited 3 million USDC into HyperLiquid and initiated a 1x leveraged short position on XPL.

item.title: CZ: Bitcoin Will Become the Global Reserve Currency
item.description: On August 29th, CZ, the founder of Binance, stated at the BITCOIN ASIA 2025 conference that "Bitcoin will become the global reserve currency."
